page.title: 10TOURISM IN IGHTHAM ( CONTD)
page.content: rafters of the roof.The massive beams, the dark thick oaken planks of the floors all denoted a period when great stability and duration were desired; when a man built a house it was for succeeding generations. An extension built during the { {18th century}includes an original Adam fire surround,the bottom part of which had to be replaced after the{massive {flood in 1968. { }The present owners have not been aware of any{ghosts}but one room on the ground floor will not be entered by the owner's daughter or dog!! One also hears stories but of course these cannot be comfirmed - one of which is that a previous owner of the house was involved with the{Gun- {powder Plot.}
